page.title: 18INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: Most people in our "BLOCK" are very interesting to talk to.For instance one day when I was at the library a man was talking to me about nuclear war and what would the world turn out to be.The{attitudes}of most people are kind and friendly and they do not let their troubles get them down.There is one girl on our estate who is handicapped,called Amey,and she cannot walk properly or do much with her hands.She still smiles however and she is never crying when I see her.My friends are{friendly}-- we sometimes fight but we always make friends again. The children in our school find the {old people}very interesting.They tell you about times long ago and how they lived.My great-grandad helps me with my school work and makes things for me and he is 86 yrs.old.
